EmailTemplate.subject: VDI Deployments Are Easier Than You'd Think, {{lead.First Name:default=Now}}. Read this Whitepaper.

Assuring Performance in VDI Deployments A Free VMTurbo Whitepaper
Download Now: <bit.ly/TV4QiL> 46% of VDI projects are halted due to cost and performance issues. They shouldn't be. Read this whitepaper for these 3 takeaways: <http://bit.ly/TV4QiL>
- Why so many VDI projects are invariably stalled - How to assure VDI performance through intelligent resource allocation and placement - How to control storage I/O and minimize latency in the virtualization and storage layers with the storage infrastructure you have in place Get Free Paper <http://bit.ly/TV4QiL> 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
